original_text: And while he lingered, the men laid hold upon his hand, and upon the hand of his wife, and upon the hand of his two daughters; the Lord being merciful unto him: and they brought him forth, and set him without the city.
korean_text: 그러나 롯이 지체하매 그 사람들이 롯의 손과 그 아내의 손과 두 딸의 손을 잡아 인도하여 성 밖에 두니 여호와께서 그에게 자비를 더하심이었더라

sentences.original_text: the men laid hold upon his hand
and upon the hand of his wife
and upon the hand of his two daughters
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 두 딸의 손도 붙잡았다

sentences.original_text: the Lord being merciful unto him
and set him without the city
